scripts.pod-install: cd ios && RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=1 bundle exec pod install
scripts.ba: npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.androidProductionReleaseBundle: yarn clean && cd android && ./gradlew bundleProductionRelease && open ./app/build/outputs/bundle/production/release
scripts.androidDevelopmentDebugAPK: yarn clean && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDevelopmentDebug && open ./app/build/outputs/apk/development/debug
scripts.androidDevelopmentReleaseAPK: yarn clean && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDevelopmentRelease && open ./app/build/outputs/apk/development/release
scripts.androidProductionDebugAPK: yarn clean && cd android && ./gradlew assembleProductionDebug && open ./app/build/outputs/apk/production/debug
scripts.androidProductionReleaseAPK: yarn clean && cd android && ./gradlew assembleProductionRelease && open ./app/build/outputs/apk/production/release
scripts.androidStagingDebugAPK: yarn clean && cd android && ./gradlew assembleStagingDebug && open ./app/build/outputs/apk/staging/debug
scripts.androidStagingReleaseAPK: yarn clean && cd android && ./gradlew assembleStagingRelease && open ./app/build/outputs/apk/staging/release
scripts.android:clean: cd android && ./gradlew clean && rm -rf app/build .gradle build
scripts.node:clean: rm -rf node_modules&& yarn cache clean && yarn install
scripts.ios:Pod:Reset: cd ios && pod deintegrate && pod setup && pod install
scripts.ios:clean: yarn node:clean &&  cd ios && rm -rf ~/Library/Caches/CocoaPods && rm -rf Pods && rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/* && yarn ios:Pod:Reset
scripts.ios:bundle:assets: react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.ios:dev-release: yarn ios:clean && yarn setDevelopment  react-native run-ios --mode=Release --scheme "development"
scripts.ios:staging-release: yarn ios:clean && yarn setStaging  react-native run-ios --mode=Release --scheme "staging"
scripts.ios:prod-release: yarn ios:clean && yarn ios:bundle:assets && yarn setProduction  react-native run-ios --mode=Release --scheme "production"
